item.description:
This event is organize by Karen with the Eastern Mass Italian Language and Culture Meetup Group.  There are 4 remaining tickets available.

If you would like one of the available tickets, please RSVP "yes", and send me an email requesting this. I'll then email you Karen's address and you can send her a personal check to pay for it, to reserve your ticket prior to the event.

Seating is assigned, and is at tables of 4 people.

Our 12 seats will be be at 3 tables, adjacent to each other.

 

Info on Patrizio Buanne:

http://movies.insing.com/feature/patrizio-buanne-the-italian-influence/id-7a501900

http://www.getshowtix.com/regattabar/moreinfo.cgi?id=2392

Born in Naples but raised in Vienna, Patrizio Buanne fell in love with his father’s Dean Martin, Frank Sinatra and Tony Bennett records. After winning a local talent competition, he performed for Pope John Paul II when he was just 17. Years later he released his debut album, L’Italiano, which appeared in Britain in 2005, followed by it's US release one year later.

An Italian singer with an affinity toward American swing and ballad style music, Patrizio Buanne has swooned the hearts of fans internationally. Through the cover songs he grew up with, this Italian has a voice that melts the soul. His concerts will make you yearn for the age for which his music is inspired.

 

Tickets are:

$35 + $3.50 venue's processing fee = $38.50

Showtime is 7:30, but we will meet at 6:45pm to be seated in time to place our dinner order before the show begins.

They recommend that people arrive 45 minutes before the show.

 

Menu:

http://www.regattabarjazz.com/food_drink/

 

To listen to Patrizio's music:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LUX5bKs9APU&feature=related

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Pflp9MdhXSM

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nf-MHTNlZoE&feature=fvst

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=acaRZKn638g

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=C1Yh3AHCqMU&feature=BFa&list=PLC8F35EB940D6E35E&index=12

 

Regattabar at the Charles Hotel, Cambridge

About:

http://www.regattabarjazz.com/about_us/

FAQ's:

http://www.regattabarjazz.com/about_us/documents/FAQSheetWeb_001.pdf
item.how_to_find_us: Karen will be in the sitting area near the doors entrance of the Regattabar, I think it is on the 2nd or 3rd floor of the Charles Hotel

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Patrizio Buanne performing at the Ragattabar
